#summary Contributing to MythDroid

== Ways to get involved ==

There are many ways to contribute to !MythDroid. Coding experience is only a prerequisite for a few. Some obvious ones:

 * Report bugs
 * Fix bugs
 * Ideas for new features
 * Implement new features
 * Translation
 * Improved artwork, layouts
 * Write or improve documentation

== How to get involved ==

Check out the resources below and then get in touch (via the development mailing list or IRC). The [http://code.google.com/p/mythdroid/issues/list issues list] should give a reasonable overview of what's being worked on but it's definitely worth a quick check that you're not about to duplicate any existing effort. The current developers will be more than happy to discuss your ideas and help you to get them incorporated.

== Resources ==

 * The [http://groups.google.com/group/mythdroid-dev development mailing list]
 * The #mythdroid IRC channel on freenode
 * [http://mythdroid.googlecode.com/svn/docs/index.html MythDroid's javadocs]
 * The [http://code.google.com/p/mythdroid/source/browse/ source]
